patthana16.1:7.1: Kusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:7.2: Kusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:7.3: Kusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:7.4: Kusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ca naabyākato nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:7.5: Kusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naakusalo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #5
patthana16.1:8.1: Akusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:8.2: Akusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:8.3: Akusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:8.4: Akusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naabyākato nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:8.5: Akusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naakusalo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #5
patthana16.1:9.1: Abyākataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:9.2: Abyākataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:9.3: Abyākataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ca naakusalo nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:10.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.1:13.1: Kusalaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana16.1:14.1: Naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā terasa … pe … napurejāte terasa … pe … navippayutte nava … pe … novigate nava.
patthana16.1:17.1: Kusalo hetu dhammo nakusalassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.1:17.2: Kusalo hetu dhammo naakusalassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.1:17.3: Kusalo hetu dhammo naabyākatassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.1:17.4: Kusalo hetu dhammo naakusalassa nahetussa ca naabyākatassa nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.1:17.5: Kusalo hetu dhammo nakusalassa nahetussa ca naakusalassa nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #5
patthana16.1:18.1: Akusalo hetu dhammo naakusalassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … pañca.
patthana16.1:19.1: Abyākato hetu dhammo nakusalassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana16.1:20.1: Kusalo hetu dhammo nakusalassa nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.1:21.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa, anantare samanantare sahajāte terasa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, pacchājāte āsevane nava, vipāke tīṇi, indriye magge aṭṭha, sampayutte vippayutte nava … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.1:22.1: Kusalaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:22.2: Kusalaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.1:23.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
